params._priceProvider: The address of ChainLink OETH/USD price feed contract

params.period: Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)
Option period in seconds (1 days <= period <= 4 weeks)

returns.settlementFee: Amount to be distributed to the Hive token holders
returns.strikeFee: Amount that covers the price difference in the ITM options

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

fees(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Used for getting the actual options prices

setImpliedVolRate(uint256).notice: Used for adjusting the options prices while balancing asset's implied volatility rate

setLockupPeriod(uint256).notice: Used for changing the lockup period

transferPoolOwnership().notice: Can be used to update the contract in critical situations in the first 90 days after deployment

unlock(uint256).notice: Unlock funds locked in the expired options
